constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 80 (Wednesday, May 11, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. DeLAURO:
H.R. 7717.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 3 provides Congress with the
power to ``regulate commerce with foreign nations, and among
the several states, and with the Indian tribes.''
[Page H4861]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

title: American Apprenticeship Act
